entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
